string-array.item:
Sowmik Sarker

This is not my full name.
But my full name is Sree Sowmik Kumar Sarker.
Bachelor of Science.\n\nThis is one kind of bachelor degree of science students.
Master in Science.\n\nIt is higher degree than BSc degree for science students.
Bachelor in Commerce.\n\nThis degree is for commerce students.

Bangladesh Civil Service.

This is one of the most popular degree in Bangladesh.
Almost every student wants to achieve this degree.
District Commissioner.\n\nThe parents of a district.
South Asian association of Regional Co-Operation.\n\nThis is an organization of Southest country in Asia.
American National Standard for International interchange.
Junior School Certificate.\n\nThis is a primary education in Bangladesh.
Junior Dakhil Certificate.\n\nThis is a certificate for Madrasha students.
Secondary School Certificate.\n\nMost famous exam in Bangladesh.
Cumulative Grade Point Average.\n\nMost bad factor that differentiate the students.
Doctor of Philosophy.\n\nThis degree is both for arts and science students.
Master of Philosophy.\n\nThis degree is both for arts and science students.
